thread.section_title: ScreenCountry Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenCountry Inc | www.screencountry.com
thread.title: Sara Higgins
thread.title_full: ScreenCountry Inc reviewed by Sara Higgins

author: Sara Higgins
title: Sara Higgins
text:
The ordering process was easy. They have great customer service. My shipment came faster than expected with no damage to the screen. Screen quality is amazing, and was true to its description. No compatibility issues. The screen looked and felt like my original one. They also have video tutorials to help you if you've never switched out a screen before.
I recommend this company to everyone!
